pullrequest.title: Added comments to render interface headers

content.raw:
I made some changes in [comments_ian](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/branches/compare/comments_ian%0Dcomments#diff) branch, feel free to merge into this pull request if they look good to you. 

The doxygen comments in derived classes should be easier to do, I believe most of them would just be:

~~~
// Documentation Inherited
~~~

if the function overrides the base class.
content.html:
I made some changes in comments_ian branch, feel free to merge into this pull request if they look good to you.

The doxygen comments in derived classes should be easier to do, I believe most of them would just be:

// Documentation Inherited

if the function overrides the base class.
